projects.title: High-Altitude Balloon (HAB) Technology Demonstrator
projects.description:
Project Stratos-1 is a student-led aerospace mission to design, launch, and recover a payload from the Stratosphere (approx. 30km altitude). The mission serves as a "Phase 1" technology demonstrator to validate the clubâ€™s capabilities in telemetry, long-range communication, and thermal engineering before progressing to orbital CubeSat missions.

Primary Goal: Capture 4K video of the Earth's curvature and safely recover the payload using custom tracking systems.
